title: Scuttles Update Suggestion regarding her eating the fruit
body:
She should have a happy sounding noise effect like the fat poro emote we had in snow down show down with tiny little hearts around her head/her antenna fold into a heart as she noms the fruit down. Bonus points if scuttles grows a bit with each fruit she eats and then she has baby mini scuttlings walk with her if she eats enough fruit.

PS: If both Scuttles are reunited together through various shenanigans, they should cuddle and interlock their antennae into hearts. If you kill a scuttles, you should get a "heartless killer" debuff for the rest of your game.

Please Riot!

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1432617879/Scuttlelove.jpg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cX2Y_RsZULM
